author: SciShow
description:
Check out Manta Sleep here https://tinyurl.com/yuyzxkx6 and make sure to use SCISHOW for 10% off your order! And then, take a nap!

The Mongol soldiers invaded places as far away as Hungary and Japan. But when they were unsuccessful, paleoclimatologists have found that weather had often interfered.

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

title: The Only Enemy the Mongols Couldn’t Beat Was the Weather
